summary: Donald Trump campaign gives white and gold hats to caucus captains in Iowa - Ahead of former President Donald Trump's projected victory at the Iowa caucuses Monday night, campaign precinct captains donned a new look. A white-and-gold variation of the MAGA hat captured the attention of his supporters at various campaign events. The 2,000 limited-edition hats were given exclusively to those who served as caucus captains - volunteers who encouraged caucus-goers to vote for the GOP frontrunner.
